name: Sperare
description:
- Sperare -

"The Game revolves around a person who tries to fight Paraplegia. 

Each level represents a nerve cell that needs to be connected to another. With each connected cell the player character gains more movement abilities and so does the protagonist."

----------------------------

Our entry for the "Ludum Dare 48" Game Jam!

  • Welcome to Ludum Dare 48 | ldjam.com | Ludum Dare game jam
  • Game-Jam topic: Deeper and deeper
  • From the 24th - 27nd  of April 2021
